files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.AIServiceConfig
files.Summary: Represents the configuration for AI services, supporting multiple providers such as OpenAI, Azure, and Foundry.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.AppConfig
files.Summary: Represents the application configuration for Notebook Automation.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.AzureProviderConfig
files.Summary: Represents the configuration for the Azure provider.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.ConfigurationExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for IConfiguration and ConfigurationBuilder.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.ConfigurationSetup
files.Summary: Provides methods to set up application configuration with support for various sources, including JSON files, environment variables, and user secrets.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.FailedOperations
files.Summary: Contains methods and constants for managing and recording failed operations.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.FoundryProviderConfig
files.Summary: Represents the configuration for the Foundry provider.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.ILoggingService
files.Summary: Defines the contract for a centralized logging service for the notebook automation system.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.LoggingService
files.Summary: Provides centralized logging capabilities for the notebook automation system.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.MicrosoftGraphConfig
files.Summary: Configuration for Microsoft Graph API.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.OpenAiProviderConfig
files.Summary: Represents the configuration for the OpenAI provider.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.PathsConfig
files.Summary: Represents the configuration settings for various file paths used in the application.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Configuration.UserSecretsHelper
files.Summary: Provides convenient access to user secrets in the application.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Models.DocumentProcessingProgressEventArgs
files.Summary: Represents the progress of document processing, including the current file and status.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Models.DocumentProcessingStatus
files.Summary: Represents the status of a document in the processing queue.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Models.ProcessingStage
files.Summary: Represents the current processing stage of a document.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Models.QueueChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event arguments for queue changes.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Models.QueueItem
files.Summary: Represents a document in the processing queue.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Models.VaultFileInfo
files.Summary: Represents information about a file within a vault for index generation.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Models.VaultIndexOptions
files.Summary: Options for vault index generation.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.AISummarizer
files.Summary: Provides AI-powered text summarization using Microsoft.SemanticKernel with Azure OpenAI integration. Implements intelligent chunking strategies for large text processing, optimized for MBA coursework content including video transcripts, PDF documents, and academic materials. Supports variable substitution for metadata augmentation and configurable prompt templates.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.IAISummarizer
files.Summary: Defines the contract for AI-powered text summarization services. Provides methods for generating summaries with variable substitution and configurable prompt templates.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.IOneDriveService
files.Summary: Interface for OneDrive service operations including authentication, file operations, sharing, and path mapping.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.IPromptService
files.Summary: Interface for services that manage and process prompt templates.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.ITextChunkingService
files.Summary: Defines the contract for text chunking operations used in AI summarization. Provides methods for splitting large texts into manageable chunks with intelligent overlap.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.OneDriveCliOptions
files.Summary: Options for configuring the behavior of OneDrive operations via the command-line interface.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.OneDriveService
files.Summary: Provides methods for authenticating and accessing OneDrive files/folders.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.PromptTemplateService
files.Summary: Service for loading prompt templates and performing variable substitution. Handles different template types (e.g., chunk summary, final summary) and supports dynamic prompt file loading.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.Text.RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter
files.Summary: A sophisticated text splitter that recursively splits text based on a hierarchy of separators, preserving semantic boundaries and ensuring better context maintenance between chunks.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.TextChunkingService
files.Summary: Provides text chunking operations for AI summarization services. Implements intelligent text splitting with overlap to maintain context continuity.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Services.VaultRootContextService
files.Summary: Provides scoped context for vault root path overrides during processing operations.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.MarkdownGeneration.MarkdownNoteProcessor
files.Summary: Provides functionality for converting HTML, TXT, or EPUB files to markdown notes, with optional AI-generated summaries.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.MarkdownGeneration.MarkdownParser
files.Summary: Parser for markdown content with frontmatter handling.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.PdfProcessing.PdfNoteBatchProcessor
files.Summary: Provides batch processing capabilities for converting multiple PDF files to markdown notes.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.PdfProcessing.PdfNoteProcessor
files.Summary: Provides functionality for extracting text and metadata from PDF files and generating markdown notes.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.Shared.BatchProcessResult
files.Summary: Represents the result and statistics of a batch document processing operation.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.Shared.DocumentNoteProcessorBase
files.Summary: Abstract base class for document note processors (PDF, video, etc.).

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.TagManagement.TagProcessor
files.Summary: Processes tags in markdown files and handles tag management operations.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.Vault.DictionaryExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for Dictionary operations.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.Vault.MetadataBatchResult
files.Summary: Result of batch metadata processing operation.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.Vault.MetadataEnsureBatchProcessor
files.Summary: Batch processor for ensuring metadata in multiple markdown files.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.Vault.MetadataEnsureProcessor
files.Summary: Processor for ensuring metadata in markdown files based on directory structure. Extracts program/course/class/module/lesson metadata and updates YAML frontmatter.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.Vault.VaultIndexBatchProcessor
files.Summary: Batch processor for generating vault index files in an Obsidian vault.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.Vault.VaultIndexBatchResult
files.Summary: Result of batch vault index generation operation.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.Vault.VaultIndexProcessor
files.Summary: Processor for generating individual vault index files.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.VideoProcessing.VideoNoteBatchProcessor
files.Summary: Provides batch processing capabilities for converting multiple video files to markdown notes.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Tools.VideoProcessing.VideoNoteProcessor
files.Summary: Represents a processor for handling video files to extract metadata, generate AI-powered summaries, and create markdown notes for knowledge management systems.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.BaseBlockGenerator
files.Summary: Provides functionality to generate Obsidian Base blocks from a YAML template with dynamic parameters.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.CourseStructureExtractor
files.Summary: Utility class for extracting course structure information (modules, lessons) from file paths.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.FileSizeFormatter
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for formatting file sizes into human-readable strings.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.FriendlyTitleHelper
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for generating friendly titles from file names or paths.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.IYamlHelper
files.Summary: Interface for YAML helper functionality used to process YAML frontmatter in markdown files.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.LoggerExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for and to simplify and standardize logging of messages with file path formatting, exception handling, and flexible message templates.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.MarkdownNoteBuilder
files.Summary: Provides a reusable, strongly-typed builder for generating markdown notes with YAML frontmatter.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.MetadataHierarchyDetector
files.Summary: Detects and infers hierarchical metadata (program, course, class, module) from file paths in a notebook vault.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.MetadataTemplateManager
files.Summary: Manages loading, parsing, and application of metadata templates from the metadata.yaml file.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.NoQuotesForBannerVisitor
files.Summary: Custom YamlDotNet visitor to avoid quotes for the banner field.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.PathFormatter
files.Summary: Utility class for formatting file paths in log messages.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.PathUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with file and directory paths.

files.Title: NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.YamlHelper
files.Summary: Helper class for working with YAML content in markdown files.
